import "../styles/moviedetails.scss"; import moment from 'moment' import useFetch from "../hooks/useFetch"; type Movie = { id: number, title: string, image: string, description:string, release: string, rating: number, duration: number, country: string, budget: number, genres: string[], actors: string[], reviews: string[], user: stri }; export default function MovieDetails() { const url = ("https://localhost:7063/api/movies/" + window.location.pathname.substring(window.location.pathname.lastIndexOf('/') + 1)) const { data: movie, error, loading, } = useFetch(url); return (
{loading &&

Loading data...

}

{movie?.title}

{moment(movie?.release).format('YYYY')}

Country:

))}

); }
